xwikidoc.content: export_selectpages=Multi-Page Export export_selectpages_invitation=A search of all pages within the Wiki can be done by matching either the: page title, name, content, or associated tags. When the search is complete and the required content is located, the pages can be exported by selecting the corresponding check box and clicking the ">>" button. export_searchform_type_pagetitle=search page title export_searchform_type_pagename=search page name export_searchform_type_pagecontent=search page content export_searchform_type_pagespace=search space export_searchform_type_tags=search tag export_searchform_search=Search export_searchform_save=Save as an export list export_searchform_next=Next export_searchform_up=Up export_searchform_down=Down export_searchform_export=Export export_searchform_select=Select export_searchform_select_none=none export_searchform_select_all=all export_savedlist=Saved lists export_savedlist_confirmdelete=Please confirm deleting saved list "{0}" export_savedexport_save=Save export_savedexport_cancel=Cancel export_savedexport_confirm=Confirm export_savedexport_name=List Name export_savedexport_defaulttitle= export_savedexport_createnew=Create new list export_exportorprint_HTML=HTML export_exportorprint_PDF=PDF export_exportorprint_RTF=RTF export_exportorprint_XARWITHVERSIONS=XAR with versions export_exportorprint_XARWITHOUTVERSIONS=XAR without versions export_exportorprint_packagename=Package Name export_exportorprint_button_export=Export export_exportorprint_button_next=Next export_exportorprint_title=Export or Print pages export_exportorprint_description=The following pages can be exported to PDF or RTF format
